description: Brigido Gutierrez, a medical marijuana patient, was fined $180,000 by the Fresno County Sheriff's Department for growing 180 marijuana plants. He told police he didn't know about the zero tolerance marijuana ordinance.  (Photo by Matias J. Ocner | News 21)
Gutierrez wears a belt with the face of Jesús Malverde, a folk saint to some drug cartels in Mexico and the United States.  (Photo by Matias J. Ocner | News21)
Gutierrez has arthritis and uses cannabis to treat his illness. (Photo by Matias J. Ocner | News 21)
